20020917

When I copy and paste in the source pane of the PDE manifest editor the paste 
results in corrupted text as the bottom of it is after the bottom of the pane.

STEPS
1) Create a plugin with the following plugin.xml
2) Copy the defintion for Table Wizard
3) paste it right after - you get lost lines and you cannot scroll to the pane

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin
   id="org.eclipse.ui.nestedwizardstest"
   name="Nestedwizardstest Plug-in"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider-name=""
   class="org.eclipse.ui.nestedwizardstest.NestedwizardstestPlugin">

   <runtime>
      <library name="nestedwizardstest.jar"/>
   </runtime>
   <requires>
      <import plugin="org.eclipse.core.resources"/>
      <import plugin="org.eclipse.ui"/>
   </requires>


   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.newWizards">
      <category
            name="Nested Wizards"
            id="org.eclipse.ui.nestedwizardstest">
      </category>
      <wizard
            name="Nested New Wizard"
            icon="icons/sample.gif"
            category="org.eclipse.ui.nestedwizardstest"
            class="org.eclipse.ui.nestedwizardstest.wizards.NestedNewWizard"
            id="org.eclipse.ui.nestedwizardstest.wizards.NestedNewWizard">
      </wizard>
      <wizard
            name="Table Wizard"
            class="org.eclipse.ui.wizardstest.TableWizard"
            id="org.eclipse.ui.wizardstest.TableWizard">
      </wizard>
   </extension>
  
</plugin>
Can you repeat this on the recent build? I tried on Win2k and it works nicely.

I can't even create a plug-in project currently because of the following so I
